data.title: Endpoint: /api/list-games
data.desc: The /api/list-games endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of games to use on this Games Api Server. Please note that this API is unauthorised and is free to use by the public, meaning you can access it without an API key â€” perfect for quick testing or public applications.

data.title: What is api list-games?
data.desc: The feature of this list-games api is used to retrieve a collection or list of game data that will be used in the GAMES API later. This api is designed to:
other: Display all types of games or games available.
Provide trials or testing for public use.
Can be used for original projects connected to this server.

dataWithCode.title: ðŸ§ª Example Fetch
dataWithCode.pre:
fetch('https://nuv-games-api.vercel.app/api/list-games')
 .then(res => res.json())
 .then(data => console.log(data))
 .catch(err => console.error('Error fetching games:', err));`
